title: Welcome to the new Environment blog

content.text: Welcome. This is the first post on our new Defra Environment blog.
We’ve expanded the previous Land Use blog so that we can showcase a greater range of stories about the environment.
From now on, we’ll cover topics like nature, water and biosecurity – as well as land use. It’s a place where we will share our work and the positive impact it’s having on people and nature.
We’ll publish frequent, short posts, including case studies, announcements and smaller updates.
If you’d like to see blog posts about a particular subject, you can use the search function. That way, you’ll see relevant posts about that subject in chronological order.
If you’d like to be notified by email when we publish something new, please subscribe to the blog.
Coming up, we’ll be posting about a pioneering new platform that connects business with nature recovery projects, World Wetlands Day, and the importance of storm overflow monitoring.
We’re glad you’re here. If you’ve got a story you’d like us to share on the blog, please email the team or comment below.
